titleStmt.title: The Marquesse of Huntley his reply to certaine noblemen, gentlemen, and ministers, covenanters of Scotland sent from their associates, to signifie unto him, that it behoved him either to assist their designes, or be carried to prison in the Castle of Edinburgh: the 20. of April, 1639. Now published, because of a false copie thereof lately printed without authoritie, or his owne consent.
titleStmt.author: Huntly, George Gordon, Marquess of, d. 1649.

titleStmt.title: The Marquesse of Huntley his reply to certaine noblemen, gentlemen, and ministers, covenanters of Scotland sent from their associates, to signifie unto him, that it behoved him either to assist their designes, or be carried to prison in the Castle of Edinburgh: the 20. of April, 1639. Now published, because of a false copie thereof lately printed without authoritie, or his owne consent.
titleStmt.author: Huntly, George Gordon, Marquess of, d. 1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Young, His Majesties printer for Scotland,

notesStmt.note: The unauthorized edition, a different version, was entitled "The character of a true subject".
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
